metadata.title: CVE-2013-4517 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Apache Santuario XML Security for Java before 1.5.6, when applying Transforms, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) via crafted Document Type Definitions (DTDs), related to signatures.

criterions.comment: libxml-security-java package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
